code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./GamePicker.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GamePicker=_ref=>{let{onGameSelect,isHost,disabled}=_ref;const availableGames={'ddf':{name:'Der d√ºmmste fliegt',icon:'üéÆ',description:'Quiz game where the worst player gets eliminated',maxPlayers:8},'schooled':{name:'School Quiz',icon:'üéì',description:'Educational quiz game for students',maxPlayers:10},'susd':{name:'SUS\'D',icon:'üîç',description:'Imposter game - find who\'s acting suspicious!',maxPlayers:10}};if(!isHost){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"game-picker",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"waiting-for-host",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Waiting for Host"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"The host will select a game to play"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-dots",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"game-picker",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"picker-title",children:"Select a Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"games-grid",children:Object.entries(availableGames).map(_ref2=>{let[gameType,game]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.button,{className:"game-option",onClick:()=>onGameSelect(gameType),disabled:disabled,whileHover:{scale:disabled?1:1.05},whileTap:{scale:disabled?1:0.95},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"game-icon",children:game.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"game-name",children:game.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"game-description",children:game.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"game-meta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"max-players",children:["Max ",game.maxPlayers," players"]})})]},gameType);})})]});};export default GamePicker;
